data.title: Major Guide: MFLL – Spanish Language
data.text: Quick Look: Immerse yourself into Peruvian culture in Cusco, the former Inca empire’s capital city. Nestled in the Andes Mountains, Cusco has lots to offer and explore, like Machu Picchu. Quick Look: From the beaches of Viña del Mar to the colorful hills of Valparaiso, experience the best of both worlds while studying in Chile. Quick Look: Study in Buenos Aires and learn to tango in the birthplace of this sensual dance and marvel in the city’s eclectic architecture, inspired by cities like Paris and Madrid. Quick Look: Live and learn in Valencia, one of Spain’s most cosmopolitan cities. Located on the Mediterranean coast, Valencia is one of Spain’s most cultural and cutting-edge cities. Quick Look: Barcelona is known for its eccentric creativity, cultural diversity, and endless amounts of energy. With stunning architecture, a unique history, and language Barcelona’s a fascinating place where you will never run out of things to see or do. Quick Look: Spain’s capital city is lively with intense cultural, artistic, and intellectual activity. It’s diverse population, world-renowned art and architecture, and dynamic nightlife make it the dream location for studying abroad. Quick Look: With vibrant neighborhoods, countless tapas bars, and boundless sunshine, the birthplace of Flamenco boasts a rich blend of Christian, Moorish, and Jewish traditions, as evidenced in its beautiful monuments and architecture. Quick Look: Earn 6 credit hours of intermediate Spanish (SPAN 223) over the course of 5 weeks in the birthplace of Flamenco. Quick Look: Enjoy 5 weeks on Spain’s central Mediterranean coast while earning 6 credit hours of upper division Spanish language. Quick Look: Earn 6 credit hours of upper division Spanish language in the exciting, adventurous and exotic country of Costa Rica! Quick Look: Engage in Chilean culture and society via service-learning. Placements available for different language levels. Quick Look: Engage in Costa Rican culture and society via service-learning. Placements available for different language levels. Quick Look: From the beaches of Viña del Mar to the colorful hills of Valparaiso, experience the best of both worlds while studying in Chile.
